itemDisplayName: Deploy VM Scale Set with Apache/PHP application(LAP) & AutoScale
description: Deploy a VM Scale Set behind a VE load balancer & each VM running an Apache/PHP app that eats CPU cycles. With Autoscale configured Scale Set will scale out & in as needed
summary: Deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs with a VE load balancer. Each VMs run a Apache/PHP application that can trigger Auto scaling activity based on defined rules
